## BlockNavigationPolicy class

Set of rules controlling keyboard navigation from a block.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class BlockNavigationPolicy implements INavigationPolicy<BlockSvg> 
```
**Implements:** [INavigationPolicy](./blockly.inavigationpolicy_interface.md)<!-- -->&lt;[BlockSvg](./blockly.blocksvg_class.md)<!-- -->&gt;

|  [isApplicable(current)](./blockly.blocknavigationpolicy_class.isapplicable_1_method.md) |  | Returns whether the given object can be navigated from by this policy. |
|  [isNavigable(current)](./blockly.blocknavigationpolicy_class.isnavigable_1_method.md) |  | Returns whether or not the given block can be navigated to. |
